name: The Panacea
description:
When the monsters first appeared, the humans were able to fight against them.  But now, the monsters have changed. The monsters have grown stronger and spread a new disease called "Insana" that turned the humans hostile like monsters and enabled them to spread the disease even further. The people could not find any cure to the disease and more and more humans fell to the disease. According to a legend,  a cure-all potion could be made with ingredients spread across the land. Adventurers sought to find the ingredients, but found nothing. As the disease spreads faster and faster,  will you be able to make the panacea and cure the disease?

This game is currently in BETA 1. Many features have not been implemented yet and you might experience bugs. Please report bugs and give feedback in the comment section below.
  • an action-adventure platformer game where you battle enemies of all sorts
  • solve puzzles as you learn more about the world around you
  • interact with characters from all over the region
Gameboy Controls
  • ◀▶ to move
  • A to interact
  • B to jump
  • Hold A to run
  • ▲ to open doors
  • ▲▼ to climb
  • Start to open menu
  • Select to attack
Computer Controls
  • ◀▶ or AD to move
  • Z, Alt or J to interact
  • X, Ctrl or K to jump
  • Hold Z, Alt or J to run
  • ▲ or W to open doors
  • ▲▼ or WS to climb
  • Enter to open menu
  • Shift to attack
Credits

All assets and scripts by me, Yousurname. Tools used: GB Studio, Tiled, Piskel, Bosca Ceoil, and OpenMPT.
